channel.itunes:summary:
The Bible reading plan Ruth Graham uses.
In one year you will listen to the Old Testament once, the New Testament twice, the Psalms twice and a Proverb every single day. No other Bible podcast offers you this kind of plan. You will always hear a portion of the Old Testament, the New Testament, a Psalm and a Proverb no mater what day you are listening to. This is an enhanced podcast and features chapters that begin with each new section being read. This enables you to jump right to any portion you please. This podcast averages about 22 min long each day, and the podcast is bookmarkable on iTunes and iPods/iPhones.
The translation is the GOD'S WORD Bible, a wonderful modern English translation (not a paraphrase), that is accurate yet easy to understand, and very enjoyable to listen to.
